text:
"Authorization granted. However, the fiscal oversight committee has flagged this operation. The budget allocation requires... re-evaluation. They're proposing a 70% reduction."
"Funding!"
"First I'll have you transferred. Then I'll find Rousseau and Laurent. You'll all answer for the audit you buried."
"Marianne guide me."
"Stamp and file."

"I have another dispatch from the Gray Fox."
"You mean your transfer request was... denied?"

"Your contact is registered in the unnamed commune just west of Lyon, in the Rhône-Alpes region."
"Your contact is registered in the Forêt de Tronçais, within the administrative district of Auvergne."
"Your contact is registered on the small island in the Golfe du Morbihan, in the Brittany region."

"His own adjutants filed the final report. Section 7, subsection C."
"You were seen upgrading the Leclerc protocols at the central depot."
"Monsieur."
"Pardon?"
"You. Again."

prose:
There was business to discuss.

One of them said, "Three days."

"Still here?" The second speaker replied.

Something shifted in One of them's demeanor. "Time's up." One of them demanded.

The second speaker responded, "Authorization granted. However, the fiscal oversight committee has flagged this operation. The budget allocation requires... re-evaluation. They're proposing a 70% reduction."

"Funding!" One of them snapped.

"First I'll have you transferred," The second speaker growled. "Then I'll find Rousseau and Laurent. You'll all answer for the audit you buried."

One of them regained composure. One of them answered, "Marianne guide me."

"Stamp and file." The second speaker responded.

One of them had come to ask for help.

One of them said, "Three days."

"Still here?" The second speaker replied.

One of them's expression hardened. "Time's up." One of them demanded.

The second speaker beamed, "I have another dispatch from the Gray Fox."

The joy was short-lived. "You mean your transfer request was... denied?" One of them sighed.

One of them had news to share.

One of them said, "Three days."

"Still here?" The second speaker replied.

Something shifted in One of them's demeanor. "Time's up." One of them demanded.

The tension eased slightly. The second speaker responded, "Your contact is registered in the unnamed commune just west of Lyon, in the Rhône-Alpes region."

"Your contact is registered in the Forêt de Tronçais, within the administrative district of Auvergne." One of them said.

"Your contact is registered on the small island in the Golfe du Morbihan, in the Brittany region." The second speaker replied.
